headline: The Estée Lauder Companies and Jo Malone London Introduce AI-Powered Scent Advisor Experience
summary: NEW YORK, December 02, 2025--The Estée Lauder Companies Inc. (NYSE: EL) and Jo Malone London today announced the launch of the Jo Malone London Scent Advisor, an innovative, AI-powered digital experience designed to help customers discover their perfect fragrance through an intuitive, conversational journey, bridging the gap between curiosity and confidence in online fragrance discovery.

headline: How Estée Lauder and Google Taught AI to Sell Fragrances
summary: A new AI bot at the beauty company’s Jo Malone unit seems to have bridged a digital chasm: getting people to buy perfume without smelling it first.
